report.title: OPEN_TICKETS
report.sql:
SELECT
count(*) as open_count, IFNULL(u.username, "Unknown") as username, IFNULL(u.name, "Unknown") as name, MIN(opened) as oldest_open, MIN(lastupdate) as oldest_lastupdate, t.admin_id
FROM #__fss_ticket_ticket as t
LEFT JOIN #__users as u ON u.id = t.admin_id
WHERE ticket_status_id IN ({status})
AND t.source != 'email' AND t.source != 'email_declined'
GROUP BY admin_id
ORDER BY open_count DESC
